page.title: 01RELIGIOUS INSTITUTIONS.
page.content: The Methodist Church offers many activities,Womens fellowship,drama group,wives & businesswomens group,& youth club.The church was built in 1884,much building has been added since. Our Lady Queen of Peace Roman Catholic Church was built in 1951,adjoining the church is the Roman Catholic school. The Church of England is St.John in Bedwardine.The church uses Manor Park school hall,monthly,for communion service,mainly attended by elderly people. The Young Mens Christian Association in Henwick Rd was formerly an orphanage The Mormen Church of the Latter Day Saints was established in 1962. The Interdominational Independent Evangelist movement started in 1958.It holds a Disabled Christian Fellowship.
